h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Stormflash Loong Staff Location
content: The Stormflash Loong Staff can be found in New Game Plus. It can be crafted at any point in your New Game Plus throughs, but you will need a lot of unique crafting materials.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Stormflash_Loong_Staff.md', within the main section titled 'Stormflash Loong Staff', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Stormflash Loong Staff Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Stormflash Loong Staff can be found in New Game Plus. It can be crafted at any point in your New Game Plus throughs, but you will need a lot of unique crafting materials.
